title.narrative: UK Aid Match Funding for the Islamic Relief Ramadan Appeal 2012

description.narrative: UKAID to provide Islamic Relief with matched funding for the next 3 years (2012-2015) for Ramadan Appeals.;

activity-date.narrative: The project had started since the 17th July 2012 and was planned to be completed for the 31st October 2015. Since the implementation schedule has been amended, it is planned to be completed by 31st March 2016.

mailing-address.narrative: 19 Rea Street South Digbeth Birmingham B5 6LB

recipient-country.narrative: Funds used to implement the project: "Climate Resilient Livelihoods for the Pastorialist Community" in Kenya.
Funds used to implement the project: "Enhancing Climate Change Adaptation and Disaster Resilience" in Bangladesh.
Funds used to implement the project: "Food Security and Livelihood Rehabilitation (Tillaberi Region)" in Niger.
Funds used to implement the project: "Integrated Socio Economic Recovery Project - ISERP" in Yemen.
Funds used to implement the project: "Sustainable Initiative for Resilience and Transformation (SIRAT)" in Pakistan.

sector.narrative: Food security and sustainable development programmes in Kenya, Niger, Pakistan and Yemen.
